trans-unit.source: The ReferralChasingOption enumeration specifies if and how referral chasing is pursued.
trans-unit.target: Opplistingen ReferralChasingOption angir om og hvordan henvisning fange er pursued.

trans-unit.source: When a server determines that other servers hold relevant information the server might refer the client to another server to obtain the result.
trans-unit.target: Når en server bestemmer som andre servere holder relevant informasjon serveren kan se klienten til en annen server for å hente resultatet.

trans-unit.source: Referral chasing is the process by which a client contacts the referenced server to continue the directory search.
trans-unit.target: Henvisning fange er prosessen som en klient kontakter referert til serveren for å fortsette Active directory-søk.

trans-unit.source: Use the constants of this enumeration to set up search preferences for referral chasing.
trans-unit.target: Bruk konstanter på denne opplisting til å definere søkeinnstillinger for henvisning fange.

trans-unit.source: The action involves assigning the appropriate fields of <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher> to elements of the ReferralChasingOption enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Handlingen inkluderer tilordne de riktige feltene i <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher>til elementer i opplistingen ReferralChasingOption.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher>

trans-unit.source: The ADSI LDAP provider supports external referrals for paged searches, but does not support subordinate referrals during paging.
trans-unit.target: ADSI LDAP-leverandør støtter eksterne referanser for sidevekslet søk, men støtter ikke underordnede referanser under Bla.

trans-unit.source: Chase referrals of either the subordinate or external type.
trans-unit.target: Chase referanser av typen underordnede eller ekstern.

trans-unit.source: If no referral chasing option is specified for a directory search, the type of referral chasing performed is External.
trans-unit.target: Hvis ingen henvisning fange alternativet er angitt for Active directory-søk, er henvisning fange utføres ekstern.

trans-unit.source: Setting this option prevents a client from contacting other servers in a referral process.
trans-unit.target: Angi dette alternativet, hindrer du at en klient kontaktet andre servere i en Referanseprosess.

trans-unit.source: Chase only subordinate referrals that are a subordinate naming context in a directory tree.
trans-unit.target: Chase bare underordnede referanser som en underordnet navngivningskontekst i en mappetreet.

trans-unit.source: The ADSI LDAP provider always turns off this flag for paged searches.
trans-unit.target: Leverandøren ADSI LDAP deaktiverer alltid dette flagget for sidevekslet søk.
